bots that I sent to picked up two pods... it seems as if something 
are blocking our comm links... I received too a messenger of 
Tylrael... it seems that something its terribly wrong... but he 
didn't like to tell me anything... perhaps we should stop to annoy 
maximals a while and the three factions have to work together...."
